name: Lionshare Software
overview:
Lionshare Software, Inc. is the premier ERP and CRM consulting firm in the Southeast region of the United States. We are a truly independent consulting firm that can help you realize the full potential of your ERP or CRM system. Headquartered in the Raleigh, North Carolina region, Lionshare consultants act as trusted advisors to expertly guide you through a thorough review of your current system and processes as well as product selection, vendor evaluation and project management.

Our experience with accounting and finance, manufacturing and distribution and CRM applications and implementations will help guide you through selecting, designing and implementing the solution that’s best for your business while minimizing costs, reducing time to implement and minimizing interruption to your business.
